short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A alternative to AEM Chrome Plug-in

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
A alternative to AEM Chrome Plugin https://chrome.google.com/webstore/detail/aem-chrome-plug-in/ejdcnikffjleeffpigekhccpepplaode

Its written in vue.js and Primevue is used for the frontend components. 
You can debug your custom functions with this extension. Also brows through the rootPanel.jsonModel from the guidelib.
Works with AEM Forms 6.5.* 

This will add an new window to the dev tools.
